title: Retrieve a Foreign Property Income & Expenditure Period Summary
description: Retrieve a Foreign Property Income & Expenditure Period Summary

fromDate.description: The first day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

toDate.description: The last day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

foreignFhlEea.description: Object holding the income and expenses of the user's Furnished Holiday Letting (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) for the period.

income.description: Object holding the income details for the period.

rentAmount.description:
Total rents and other income from property.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

expenditure.description: Object holding the expenditure for the period.

premisesRunningCosts.description:
Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents and other costs.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

repairsAndMaintenance.description:
Property repairs and maintenance.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

financialCosts.description:
Loan interest and other financial costs.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

professionalFees.description:
Legal, management and other professional fees.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

costsOfServices.description:
Cost of services provided, including wages.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

travelCosts.description:
Car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

other.description:
Other allowable property expenses.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

consolidatedExpenses.description:
Sum of all expenses for the specified period.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

foreignProperty.description: Array holding the income and expenses of the user's foreign property business - excluding Furnished Holiday Lettings (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) - for the period.

countryCode.description:
A three-letter code that represents a country name.

This must be an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 value.

income.description: Object holding the income details for the period.

rentIncome.description: An object containing the amount taken in rent and any tax deducted.

rentAmount.description:
The total amount of rental income.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR) has been claimed.

premiumOfLeaseGrant.description:
Premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

otherPropertyIncome.description:
Other income from property, such as rent charges and ground rents, income from letting others tip waste on your land, and income for the use of a caravan or houseboat at a fixed location.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

foreignTaxTakenOff.description:
The total amount of foreign tax taken off your income.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

specialWithholdingTaxOrUKTaxPaid.description:
Tax withheld (in UK Pounds) on certain payments to UK residents or UK Tax taken off rental Income (applies to non-resident landlords only).

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

expenditure.description: Object holding the expenditure for the period.

premisesRunningCosts.description:
Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents and other costs.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

repairsAndMaintenance.description:
Property repairs and maintenance.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

financialCosts.description:
Loan interest and other financial costs.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

professionalFees.description:
Legal, management and other professional fees.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

costsOfServices.description:
Cost of services provided, including wages.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

travelCosts.description:
Car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

residentialFinancialCost.description:
The residential financial cost that can be deductible from rental income (tax relief).

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

broughtFwdResidentialFinancialCost.description:
Amount of relief brought forward for restricted residential financial costs.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

other.description:
Other allowable property expenses.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

consolidatedExpenses.description:
Sum of all expenses for the specified period.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.

rel.description:
A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource
The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.
